name: El Poder Oscuro
storyline: An evil and unknown Dark Power advances inexorably, absorbing all the light and energy of the planet. Only you can conjure this nightmare come true. But you are not so helpless: you have a gigantic robot, as well as the ship that directs it from its powerful head and to reach the tiniest corners you can leave the robot and the ship to advance on foot armed with your laser rifle
summary:
An arcade where you will see the computer screen fade little by little due to the fearsome Dark Power.

You control three characters, a gigantic robot, the control ship that is in his head and the protagonist Jhon Yaniro.
